note.p: Optical instrument maker. Richard Beck was his apprentice. Entered into partnership with Beck in 1847.
Census returns of England and Wales 1841 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/666/6/8/8), 1861 (RG9/151/125/20), 1851 (HO107/1532/72/17), 1871 (RG10/299/34/1)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.com, accessed 9 April 2018)
